rule.name: reportNumberComponents
rule.definition: load( local!intA, local!intB: 17, local!intConfigLabel: "Configurable Label", local!intConfigInstr: "Configurable Instructions", local!intConfigReq: 1, local!intConfigRO: 1, local!intConfigDisabled: 1, local!intConfigValue, local!intConfigValidation: "", local!floatA, local!floatB: 17, local!floatConfigLabel: "Configurable Label", local!floatConfigInstr: "Configurable Instructions", local!floatConfigReq: 1, local!floatConfigRO: 1, local!floatConfigDisabled: 1, local!floatConfigValue, local!floatConfigValidation: "", #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dashboardLayout"( firstColumnContents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayout"(label: "Integer Field Examples", firstColumnContents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_integerField"(label: "Value A", value: local!intA, saveInto: local!intA), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_integerField"(label: "Also Value A", instructions: "This one has instructions and is required.", required: true, value: local!intA, saveInto: local!intA), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_integerField"(label: "Read Only A", readOnly: true, value: local!intA), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_integerField"(label: "Disabled A", disabled: true, value: local!intA), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_integerField"(label: "Validate A", instructions: "Validates that it's less than 500", value: local!intA, validations: if(cast('type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Integer', local!intA) > 500, "Value A is too big!", ""), saveInto: local!intA), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"(label: "Debug A", instructions: "Type: " & typeof(local!intA) & " (" & typename(typeof(local!intA)) & "), isnull: " & isnull(local!intA), value: local!intA), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_integerField"(label: "Value B", instructions: "This has a default value of 17.", value: local!intB, saveInto: local!intB), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_integerField"(label: "Also Value B", instructions: "This one has instructions and is required.", required: true, value: local!intB, saveInto: local!intB), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_integerField"(label: "Read Only B", readOnly: true, value: local!intB), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_integerField"(label: "Disabled B", disabled: true, value: local!intB), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_integerField"(label: "Validate B", instructions: "Validates that it's more than -500", value: local!intB, validations: if(local!intB < -500, "Value B is too small!", ""), saveInto: local!intB), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_integerField"(label: "Value B But No SaveInto", value: local!intB), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"(label: "Debug B", instructions: "Type: " & typeof(local!intB) & " (" & typename(typeof(local!intB)) & "), isnull: " & isnull(local!intB), value: local!intB), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_integerField"(label: "No Value, No SaveInto") }), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayout"(label: "Configurable Integer Field", firstColumnContents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_integerField"( label: local!intConfigLabel, instructions: local!intConfigInstr, required: toboolean(local!intConfigReq - 1), readOnly: toboolean(local!intConfigRO - 1), disabled: toboolean(local!intConfigDisabled - 1), value: local!intConfigValue, validations: local!intConfigValidation, saveInto: local!intConfigValue ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"(label: "Label", value: local!intConfigLabel, saveInto: local!intConfigLabel), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"(label: "Instructions", value: local!intConfigInstr, saveInto: local!intConfigInstr), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_radioButtonFieldByIndex"(label: "Required", choiceLabels: { "False", "True" }, value: local!intConfigReq, saveInto: local!intConfigReq), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_radioButtonFieldByIndex"(label: "Read Only", choiceLabels: { "False", "True" }, value: local!intConfigRO, saveInto: local!intConfigRO), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_radioButtonFieldByIndex"(label: "Disabled", choiceLabels: { "False", "True" }, value: local!intConfigDisabled, saveInto: local!intConfigDisabled), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_integerField"(label: "Value", value: local!intConfigValue, saveInto: local!intConfigValue), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"(label: "Validation Message", value: local!intConfigValidation, saveInto: local!intConfigValidation) }) }, secondColumnContents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayout"(label: "Floating Point Field Examples", firstColumnContents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_floatingPointField"(label: "Value A", value: local!floatA, saveInto: local!floatA), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_floatingPointField"(label: "Also Value A", instructions: "This one has instructions and is required.", required: true, value: local!floatA, saveInto: local!floatA), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_floatingPointField"(label: "Read Only A", readOnly: true, value: local!floatA), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_floatingPointField"(label: "Disabled A", disabled: true, value: local!floatA), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_floatingPointField"(label: "Validate A", instructions: "Validates that it's less than 500", value: local!floatA, validations: if(cast('type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Integer', local!floatA) > 500, "Value A is too big!", ""), saveInto: local!floatA), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"(label: "Debug A", instructions: "Type: " & typeof(local!floatA) & " (" & typename(typeof(local!floatA)) & "), isnull: " & isnull(local!floatA), value: local!floatA), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_floatingPointField"(label: "Value B", instructions: "This has a default value of 17.", value: local!floatB, saveInto: local!floatB), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_floatingPointField"(label: "Also Value B", instructions: "This one has instructions and is required.", required: true, value: local!floatB, saveInto: local!floatB), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_floatingPointField"(label: "Read Only B", readOnly: true, value: local!floatB), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_floatingPointField"(label: "Disabled B", disabled: true, value: local!floatB), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_floatingPointField"(label: "Validate B", instructions: "Validates that it's more than -500", value: local!floatB, validations: if(local!floatB < -500, "Value B is too small!", ""), saveInto: local!floatB), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_floatingPointField"(label: "Value B But No SaveInto", value: local!floatB), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"(label: "Debug B", instructions: "Type: " & typeof(local!floatB) & " (" & typename(typeof(local!floatB)) & "), isnull: " & isnull(local!floatB), value: local!floatB), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_floatingPointField"(label: "No Value, No SaveInto") }), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayout"(label: "Configurable Floating Point Field", firstColumnContents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_floatingPointField"( label: local!floatConfigLabel, instructions: local!floatConfigInstr, required: toboolean(local!floatConfigReq - 1), readOnly: toboolean(local!floatConfigRO - 1), disabled: toboolean(local!floatConfigDisabled - 1), value: local!floatConfigValue, validations: local!floatConfigValidation, saveInto: local!floatConfigValue ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"(label: "Label", value: local!floatConfigLabel, saveInto: local!floatConfigLabel), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"(label: "Instructions", value: local!floatConfigInstr, saveInto: local!floatConfigInstr), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_radioButtonFieldByIndex"(label: "Required", choiceLabels: { "False", "True" }, value: local!floatConfigReq, saveInto: local!floatConfigReq), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_radioButtonFieldByIndex"(label: "Read Only", choiceLabels: { "False", "True" }, value: local!floatConfigRO, saveInto: local!floatConfigRO), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_radioButtonFieldByIndex"(label: "Disabled", choiceLabels: { "False", "True" }, value: local!floatConfigDisabled, saveInto: local!floatConfigDisabled), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_floatingPointField"(label: "Value", value: local!floatConfigValue, saveInto: local!floatConfigValue), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"(label: "Validation Message", value: local!floatConfigValidation, saveInto: local!floatConfigValidation) }) } ) )
